= git add =

The `git add` command can be used for many purposes.
DO NOT think of this command as "add file to project", rather "add to the next commit".

== Tracking ==
For explanation of tracked/untracked files see [[Git files]].
To start tracking a file:
`git add /path/to/file`

== Staging ==
See [[Git files]] for explantion.
To stage a file:
`git add /path/to/file`
